profile.Name: Jose David Rios Colmenares
profile.descripcion: I am a developer of web and mobile applications. Electronics engineer who has learned to apply knowledge of electronics for a more efficient development in this environment, automating tasks for your comfort.

main.title: Nice to meet you!!
main.body: hi!, I'm Jose David Rios, and if you're looking for someone whit good creative skills to make your automate your life, then yo're in the right place! I would love for us to have the opportunity to meet and contribute to the success of your company with my Programming Skills and Process Management
main.footer: I invite you to contact me!

work.title: Portfolio of jobs
